org.qdl_lang.util.aggregate.ProcessScalar

  • Packages that use ProcessScalar 
    Package Description
    org.qdl_lang.evaluate
    Evaluators evaluate the built-in functions for QDL as well as perform the usual algebraic operations.
    org.qdl_lang.extensions.crypto
    The cryptographic module.
    org.qdl_lang.util.aggregate
    Utilities for dealing with aggregates, i.e., sets and stems in QDL.
